thread.title: GoTransverse Adds Microsoft Dynamics NAV Partner to its VAR Channel -
thread.title_full: GoTransverse Adds Microsoft Dynamics NAV Partner to its VAR Channel - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: GoTransverse Adds Microsoft Dynamics NAV Partner to its VAR Channel -
text:
Leader in online billing software solutions partners taps into valuable Dynamics market by partnering with Advanced Business Systems, a Microsoft Gold Partner in Dynamics NAV.
Austin, Texas (PRWEB) October 13, 2015
goTransverse , a provider of online subscription billing solutions based in Austin, TX, has gained another valuable partner to further its rapidly-expanding market reach. Advanced Business Systems (ABS), a Microsoft Gold Partner in Dynamics NAV also based in Austin, will become goTransverse’s newest value-added reseller (VAR), providing the online billing solution its first link to the crucial Dynamics NAV market.
goTransverse CEO, James Messer, described the development as a key moment in the young company’s already-exciting history. “This partnership will allow goTransverse to pursue the Dynamics market with true seamless integration,” he said. “We’ll be the only Dynamics-certified cloud offering for usage billing, a first-mover in a fast-growing international market.”
ABS will be an important reseller of TRACT® , goTransverse’s 100% cloud-based subscription and usage-based billing solution. Through ABS, goTransverse will have access to the valuable Microsoft Dynamics NAV customer base. As part of joining the goTransverse VAR channel, ABS will manage a TRACT Dynamics NAV Connector, which will provide a seamless integration between NAV and TRACT®. The integration also means TRACT® will be a Microsoft Certified solution, a coveted status necessary to effectively penetrate the Dynamics market.
“Forging this relationship with goTransverse represents a major growth opportunity for ABS,” says Christopher Carrigee, President of ABS. “Our job is to help our clients automate tasks and drive efficiencies through streamlined business processes. By offering true cloud-based billing from goTransverse we’ll be offering the Dynamics NAV market a major leap forward in efficiency, accuracy and scalability.”
ABS has offices in Austin, New Orleans and Nashville. Its reach spans a range of industries and professions, including retail, manufacturing, distribution, oil field services and corporate accounting.
About goTransverse
goTransverse powers leading-edge companies who push conventional boundaries with disruptive product and services offerings. The TRACT® platform supports the monetization of any combination of one-time, subscription, and usage-based offerings with near real-time metering, rating and native revenue recognition. The result is top-line revenue growth, faster time-to-market, visibility into revenue streams and operational savings. Our customer base includes publicly traded and privately held companies typically technology-focused in cloud solutions, digital entertainment and media, Internet of Things (IoT), Machine-to-Machine (M2M), logistics and hosting/managed services. Visit http://www.gotransverse.com to learn more.
About Advance Business Systems
Advanced Business Systems is a Microsoft Gold Partner in Dynamics NAV with offices in Austin, New Orleans and Nashville. With over 16 years of experience in designing, implementing and supporting Dynamics NAV, ABS has a proven track record of helping companies improve efficiency and profitability. The company specializes in customized solutions for companies in manufacturing, distribution and service management. Visit http://www.adv-usa.com/ to learn more.
